column4: i downloaded an .img file of ubuntu 9.04 Laptop Edition but in my intrepid i got create a usb start up disk which does not allow .img files
i tried searching for usb-image-writer in synaptic but i was not able to find anything relevant
can some one help me with this
you can get a program to make that .img into a usb bootable disk or get an iso to make a bootable disk.  http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ubuntu_Live_USB_creator for the former
